name: Escape Camp Waddalooh
description:
Falkrus® invites you to experience the thrill of immersive VR at camp Waddalooh.
Keep your wits about you as you explore camp for an escape with nothing but a flashlight.

Featuring:
  • VR immersion and interaction using the HTC Vive headset and controllers.
  • VR immersion and interaction using the Oculus Rift headset and controllers.
  • Physical movement
  • Touchpad movement
  • Object interaction using controller grips
